column2:
Please solve the following logic puzzle in the following table: 

|        |    1    |    2    |    3    |    4    |    5    |
| color  |         |         |         |         |         |
| sport |         |         |         |         |         |
| birthday  |         |         |         |         |         |
| beverage |         |         |         |         |         |
| cigar  |         |         |         |         |          

Puzzle: 
 

BeverageThere are 5 different favourite colors: blue, green, red, white, yellow
The people prefer 5 different types of sport: tennis, skateboarding, soccer, parkour, snowboarding
There are 5 different favourite beverages: beer, coffee, milk, tea, water
5 different brands of cigars are smoked: bluemaster, dunhill, pall-mall, prince, blend
The people's birthday is in 5 different months: february, april, january, june, november
1. the person who's sport is tennis is the person who likes red
2. the person who's sport is snowboarding is the person who's birthday is in january
3. the person who's sport is skateboarding is the person drinking tea
4. the person who likes green is on the left of the person who likes white
5. the person who likes green is the person drinking coffee
6. the pall-mall-smoker is the person who's birthday is in april
7. the person who likes yellow is the dunhill-smoker
8. the person drinking milk is in the middle
9. the person who's sport is parkour is on the far left
10. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the person who's birthday is in february
11. the person who's birthday is in novembers is on the left or right of the dunhill-smoker
12. the bluemaster-smoker is the person drinking beer
13. the person who's sport is soccer is the prince-smoker
14. the person who's sport is parkour is on the left or right of the person who likes blue
15. the blend-smoker is on the left or right of the person drinking water. Please put '#############' around the final solution table.
